articles.title: Huawei Band 6 and Band 6 Pro tipped to launch next month with the P50 and P50 Pro - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: Huawei is allegedly planning to release the Band 6 and Band 6 Pro next month, thereby skipping the fifth generation of its Band series. The Band 6 series is expected to launch simultaneously with the P50 and P50 Pro.
